channel.title: Wild zone help - really easy question please help fast
channel.description:
k i kno how to do safe zones but can somone help me with this 1 part about them.
[code](absX >= 3270 && absX <= 3270 && absY >= 3343 && absY <= 3343) ||[/code]
k how do i put the cords in
like do i go to north west and south easy but then is it how?
3270 is for x of the north cor and 3270 is the x of the south code but what are the other 2
or is it evan north west and south east or what is it?
please help
thanks
